eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.items

Interface ISectionable<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder,T extends IHeader>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFlexible<VH>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSectionableItem

    public interface ISectionable<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder,T extends IHeader>
extends IFlexible<VH>
    This interface represents an item in the section.

    With this interface linking the header/parent is simplified.

    Since:
    07/02/2016 Created
    26/03/2016 setHeader returns void
    See Also:
    IFlexible, IExpandable, IFilterable, IHeader, IHolder
